dmca.title: [EV1-C1574439B] www.msfirefox.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Monday, October 30, 2006 1:58 PM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: [EV1-C1574439B] www.msfirefox.com Subject: [EV1-C1574439B] www.msfirefox.com Reference: [EV1-C1574439B] We regret to inform you that abuse@theplanet.com/abuse@ev1servers.net is not able to process email attachments in any format other than plain text. This includes forwarding non-text attachments to legal@theplanet.com. In order to assure proper processing of your report, you may perform one of the following options: 1. Email your report directly to our legal counsel at copyright@theplanet.com. 2. Fax your report to 1-214-782-7756. 3. Send a paper copy of your report to Legal Department The Planet Internet Services, Inc., 1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas, TX 75207 USA. For further information on how to submit copyright violation notifications, please visit: http://theplanet.com/legal/copyright.html http://ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx -- Regards, Abuse Department The Planet - EV1Servers http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html http://ev1servers.net/About/aup.aspx http://ev1servers.net/About/tos.aspx http://www.ev1.net/english/about/aup.asp http://www.ev1.net/english/about/tos.asp ==== Original Message ==== 1. www.msfirefox.com Added by system at Saturday, Oct 28 2006 01:17 pm X-MailFrom: americanzombie@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [207.218.192.33] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Tracert shows this site comes out to the IP of 67.15.250.17 which I believe is owned by you.
